CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 5, 1958, pg. 4 reads: "7. The Keystone Plumbing Sales booth with Robert Basil representing the Mutschler Kitchens. Both Westinghouse appliances and Mutschler cabinets made a most attractive modern kitchen stage display."
TitMainTitle: Robert Basil standing in Keystone Plumbing booth in Syria Mosque for the 1958 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
